data_table.description: Multiplexed Immunoassay Panel 1 (SABRe Project 2), Offspring Cohort Exam 7, Generation 3 Cohort Exam 1. This is the first in a series of immunoassay panels done on the same group of participants (Offspring Exam 7 and Gen 3 Exam 1). To get a full set of all the immunoassays done, please combine the following datasets: l_mpimn01_2005_m_0692s, l_mpimn02_2005_m_0693s, l_mpimn03_2005_m_0694s, l_mpimn04_2005_m_0757s, l_mpimn05_2005_m_0758s, l_mpimn06_2005_m_0792s, l_mpimn07_2005_m_0802s, and l_mpimn08_2005_m_0836s.

variable.name: plate_id
variable.comment: Character variable Blank = Field not filled in. Non-blank = Field filled in.

variable.name: clusterin_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: apo_a1_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: apo_b100_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: lpa_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: crp_i
variable.value: Set to missing because CV was above allowable limit

variable.name: clusterin
variable.comment: The minimum detectable limit for CLUSTERIN is 15000 pg/mL. Values below 15000 are set to 15000. Use CLUSTERIN_I to see what records are below the detectable limit. CLUSTERIN values were set to unknown if CLUSTERIN_CV was greater than or equal to 32.9 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1), or 25.7 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: clusterin_cv
variable.comment: CLUSTERIN_CV values were set to unknown if CLUSTERIN_CV was greater than or equal to 32.9 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1), or 25.7 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: apo_a1
variable.comment: The minimum detectable limit for APO_A1 is 343000 pg/mL. Values below 343000 are set to 343000. The maximum detectable limit for APO_A1 is 5190000000 pg/mL. Values above 5190000000 are set to 5190000000. Use APO_A1_I to see what records are below the detectable limit. APO_A1 values were set to unknown if APO_A1_CV was greater than or equal to 73.3 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1), or 80.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: apo_a1_cv
variable.comment: APO_A1_CV values were set to unknown if APO_A1_CV was greater than or equal to 73.3 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1), or 80.2 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: apo_b100
variable.comment: The minimum detectable limit for APO_B100 is 2570000 pg/mL. Values below 2570000 is set to 2570000. Use APO_B100_I to see what records are below the detectable limit. APO_B100 values were set to unknown if APO_B100_CV was greater than or equal to 45.4 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: apo_b100_cv
variable.comment: APO_B100_CV values were set to unknown if APO_B100_CV was greater than or equal to 45.4 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: crp
variable.comment: The minimum detectable limit for CRP is 2000 pg/mL. Values below 2000 are set to 2000. The maximum detectable limit for CRP is 34700000 pg/mL. Value above 34700000 are set to 34700000. Use CRP_I to see what records are below the detectable limit. CRP values were set to unknown if CRP_CV was greater than or equal to 40.8 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 36.0 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: crp_cv
variable.comment: CRP_CV values were set to unknown if CRP_CV was greater than or equal to 40.8 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 36.0 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: lpa
variable.comment: The minimum detectable limit for LPA is 3200000 pg/mL. Values below 3200000 are set to 3200000. Use LPA_I to see what records are below the detectable limit. LPA values were set to unknown if LPA_CV was greater than or equal to 34.0 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 34.9 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).

variable.name: lpa_cv
variable.comment: LPA_CV values were set to unknown if LPA_CV was greater than or equal to 34.0 for Offspring (IDTYPE = 1) or 34.9 for Gen 3 (IDTYPE = 3).
